sentences.english: Once upon a time, a kind woodcutter lived alone in the mountains.
sentences.korean: 옛날 옛적에, 친절한 나무꾼이 산속에 혼자 살았습니다.

sentences.english: One day, he saved a deer from a hunter and the deer gave him advice.
sentences.korean: 어느 날, 그는 사냥꾼으로부터 사슴을 구했고 사슴이 그에게 조언을 해주었습니다.

sentences.english: The deer told him about fairies who bathed in a secret pond.
sentences.korean: 사슴은 비밀 연못에서 목욕하는 선녀들에 대해 말해주었습니다.

sentences.english: A woodcutter hid a fairy's winged clothes so she couldn't fly.
sentences.korean: 나무꾼은 선녀가 날지 못하도록 그녀의 날개 옷을 숨겼습니다.

sentences.english: The fairy was stranded on earth and had nowhere to go.
sentences.korean: 선녀는 지상에 발이 묶여 갈 곳이 없었습니다.

sentences.english: The woodcutter offered to let her stay in his humble home.
sentences.korean: 나무꾼은 그녀를 자신의 초라한 집에 머물게 해주겠다고 제안했습니다.

sentences.english: They married and had two lovely children together.
sentences.korean: 그들은 결혼해서 사랑스러운 두 아이를 낳았습니다.

sentences.english: The fairy was a good mother and took care of the family well.
sentences.korean: 선녀는 좋은 어머니였고 가족을 잘 돌보았습니다.

sentences.english: But she often looked at the sky and sighed with longing.
sentences.korean: 하지만 그녀는 자주 하늘을 바라보며 그리움에 한숨을 쉬었습니다.

sentences.english: The deer had warned him to wait until they had three children.
sentences.korean: 사슴은 그에게 세 아이를 가질 때까지 기다리라고 경고했었습니다.

sentences.english: He gave her the clothes back too early, before having a third child.
sentences.korean: 그는 셋째 아이를 갖기 전, 너무 일찍 그녀에게 옷을 돌려주었습니다.

sentences.english: The woodcutter felt sorry for her sadness and made a mistake.
sentences.korean: 나무꾼은 그녀의 슬픔에 미안해서 실수를 저질렀습니다.

sentences.english: She flew back to heaven holding the children in her arms.
sentences.korean: 그녀는 아이들을 품에 안고 하늘로 다시 날아갔습니다.

sentences.english: The woodcutter was very sad and missed his family.
He cried every day and prayed for a way to see them again.
sentences.korean: 그는 매일 울며 그들을 다시 볼 수 있는 방법을 기도했습니다.

sentences.english: The deer felt sorry for him and told him about a magic bucket.
sentences.korean: 사슴은 그를 불쌍히 여겨 마법의 두레박에 대해 알려주었습니다.

sentences.english: He climbed a beanstalk to find them in the sky kingdom.
sentences.korean: 그는 하늘나라에서 그들을 찾기 위해 콩나무를 탔습니다.

sentences.english: In the sky kingdom, he was finally reunited with his family.
